price: Abo ni bo bazahembwa imyanya yo hejuru (mu ijuru) kubera ukwihangana kwabo. Bazakirizwamo indamutso n’amagambo by’amahoro,
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يُجۡزَوۡنَ ٱلۡغُرۡفَةَ بِمَا صَبَرُواْ وَيُلَقَّوۡنَ فِيهَا تَحِيَّةٗ وَسَلَٰمًا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: ulāika yuj'zawna al-ghur'fata bimā ṣabarū wayulaqqawna fīhā taḥiyyatan wasalāman
